price: abiding therein forever[34]. What a terrible burden they will carry on the Day of Resurrection!
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا
footnotes: [34] i.e., in the state of sin and punishment.
